title: Privacy Policy
welcome: Welcome to Zykr App. Your privacy is very important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our app.

section1.heading: 1. Information We Collect
items: Personal Information: Name, email address, and login credentials you provide when creating an account.
Usage Data: Your app usage such as tasbeeh counts, groups joined, community contributions, progress, and interaction with app features.
Device Information: Your device type, operating system, app version, and language preferences.

section2.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: To provide and personalize your tasbeeh experience, including default and custom tasbeeh tracking.
To enable group and community tasbeeh features and show top contributors.
To send updates, notifications, and newsletters about spiritual growth, app features, and promotions.
To improve app functionality and performance based on your usage data.

section3.heading: 3. Sharing Your Information
section3.text: We respect your privacy and do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with:
items: Our trusted service providers for app hosting, analytics, and notifications.
Community features where your username and contributions may be visible to other users.
Legal authorities if required by law or to protect our rights.

section4.heading: 4. Data Security
section4.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. While we strive to keep your data safe, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure.

section5.heading: 5. Your Choices
items: You can update your profile, change your language, or manage notification preferences at any time.
You can delete your account, which will remove your personal information from our servers.

section6.heading: 6. Children’s Privacy
section6.text: Zykr App is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

section7.heading: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section7.text: We may update this policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Any updates will be posted in the app.

section8.heading: 8. Contact Us
section8.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how your data is used, please contact us:
